text: And Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of David [strongs id="h1732" /] was strengthened [strongs id="h2388" tvm="8691" /] in his kingdom [strongs id="h4438" /], and the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] his God [strongs id="h0430" /] [was] with him, and magnified [strongs id="h1431" tvm="8762" /] him exceedingly [strongs id="h4605" /].

Then Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /] spake [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto all Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], to the captains [strongs id="h8269" /] of thousands [strongs id="h0505" /] and of hundreds [strongs id="h3967" /], and to the judges [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8802" /], and to every governor [strongs id="h5387" /] in all Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], the chief [strongs id="h7218" /] of the fathers [strongs id="h0001" /].

So Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /], and all the congregation [strongs id="h6951" /] with him, went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] to the high place [strongs id="h1116" /] that [was] at Gibeon [strongs id="h1391" /]; for there was the tabernacle [strongs id="h0168" /] of the congregation [strongs id="h4150" /] of God [strongs id="h0430" /], which Moses [strongs id="h4872" /] the servant [strongs id="h5650" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] had made [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] in the wilderness [strongs id="h4057" /].

But [strongs id="h0061" /] the ark [strongs id="h0727" /] of God [strongs id="h0430" /] had David [strongs id="h1732" /] brought up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8689" /] from Kirjathjearim [strongs id="h7157" /] to [the place which] David [strongs id="h1732" /] had prepared [strongs id="h3559" tvm="8687" /] for it: for he had pitched [strongs id="h5186" tvm="8804" /] a tent [strongs id="h0168" /] for it at Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /].

Moreover the brasen [strongs id="h5178" /] altar [strongs id="h4196" /], that Bezaleel [strongs id="h1212" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Uri [strongs id="h0221" /], the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Hur [strongs id="h2354" /], had made [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /], he put [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8804" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] the tabernacle [strongs id="h4908" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /]: and Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /] and the congregation [strongs id="h6951" /] sought [strongs id="h1875" tvm="8799" /] unto it.

And Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /] went up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8686" /] thither to the brasen [strongs id="h5178" /] altar [strongs id="h4196" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], which [was] at the tabernacle [strongs id="h0168" /] of the congregation [strongs id="h4150" /], and offered [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8686" /] a thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] burnt offerings [strongs id="h5930" /] upon it.

In that night [strongs id="h3915" /] did God [strongs id="h0430" /] appear [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8738" /] unto Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /], and said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto him, Ask [strongs id="h7592" tvm="8798" /] what I shall give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] thee.

And Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] unto God [strongs id="h0430" /], Thou hast shewed [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] great [strongs id="h1419" /] mercy [strongs id="h2617" /] unto David [strongs id="h1732" /] my father [strongs id="h0001" /], and hast made me to reign [strongs id="h4427" tvm="8689" /] in his stead.

Now, O LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] God [strongs id="h0430" /], let thy promise [strongs id="h1697" /] unto David [strongs id="h1732" /] my father [strongs id="h0001" /] be established [strongs id="h0539" tvm="8735" /]: for thou hast made me king [strongs id="h4427" tvm="8689" /] over a people [strongs id="h5971" /] like the dust [strongs id="h6083" /] of the earth [strongs id="h0776" /] in multitude [strongs id="h7227" /].

Give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8798" /] me now wisdom [strongs id="h2451" /] and knowledge [strongs id="h4093" /], that I may go out [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8799" /] and come in [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] this people [strongs id="h5971" /]: for who can judge [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8799" /] this thy people [strongs id="h5971" /], [that is so] great [strongs id="h1419" /]?

And God [strongs id="h0430" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] to Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /], Because this was in thine heart [strongs id="h3824" /], and thou hast not asked [strongs id="h7592" tvm="8804" /] riches [strongs id="h6239" /], wealth [strongs id="h5233" /], or honour [strongs id="h3519" /], nor the life [strongs id="h5315" /] of thine enemies [strongs id="h8130" tvm="8802" /], neither yet hast asked [strongs id="h7592" tvm="8804" /] long [strongs id="h7227" /] life [strongs id="h3117" /]; but hast asked [strongs id="h7592" tvm="8799" /] wisdom [strongs id="h2451" /] and knowledge [strongs id="h4093" /] for thyself, that thou mayest judge [strongs id="h8199" tvm="8799" /] my people [strongs id="h5971" /], over whom I have made thee king [strongs id="h4427" tvm="8689" /]:

Wisdom [strongs id="h2451" /] and knowledge [strongs id="h4093" /] [is] granted [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8803" /] unto thee; and I will give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] thee riches [strongs id="h6239" /], and wealth [strongs id="h5233" /], and honour [strongs id="h3519" /], such as none of the kings [strongs id="h4428" /] have had that [have been] before [strongs id="h6440" /] thee, neither shall there any after [strongs id="h0310" /] thee have the like.

Then Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /] came [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8799" /] [from his journey] to the high place [strongs id="h1116" /] that [was] at Gibeon [strongs id="h1391" /] to Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /], from before [strongs id="h6440" /] the tabernacle [strongs id="h0168" /] of the congregation [strongs id="h4150" /], and reigned [strongs id="h4427" tvm="8799" /] over Israel [strongs id="h3478" /].

And Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /] gathered [strongs id="h0622" tvm="8799" /] chariots [strongs id="h7393" /] and horsemen [strongs id="h6571" /]: and he had a thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] and four [strongs id="h0702" /] hundred [strongs id="h3967" /] chariots [strongs id="h7393" /], and twelve [strongs id="h8147" /] [strongs id="h6240" /] thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] horsemen [strongs id="h6571" /], which he placed [strongs id="h3240" tvm="8686" /] in the chariot [strongs id="h7393" /] cities [strongs id="h5892" /], and with the king [strongs id="h4428" /] at Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /].

And the king [strongs id="h4428" /] made [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] silver [strongs id="h3701" /] and gold [strongs id="h2091" /] at Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /] [as plenteous] as stones [strongs id="h0068" /], and cedar trees [strongs id="h0730" /] made [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] he as the sycomore trees [strongs id="h8256" /] that [are] in the vale [strongs id="h8219" /] for abundance [strongs id="h7230" /].

And Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /] had horses [strongs id="h5483" /] brought [strongs id="h4161" /] out of Egypt [strongs id="h4714" /], and linen yarn [strongs id="h4723" /]: the king’s [strongs id="h4428" /] merchants [strongs id="h5503" tvm="8802" /] received [strongs id="h3947" tvm="8799" /] the linen yarn [strongs id="h4723" /] at a price [strongs id="h4242" /].

And they fetched up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /], and brought forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8686" /] out of Egypt [strongs id="h4714" /] a chariot [strongs id="h4818" /] for six [strongs id="h8337" /] hundred [strongs id="h3967" /] [shekels] of silver [strongs id="h3701" /], and an horse [strongs id="h5483" /] for an hundred [strongs id="h3967" /] and fifty [strongs id="h2572" /]: and so brought they out [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8686" /] [horses] for all the kings [strongs id="h4428" /] of the Hittites [strongs id="h2850" /], and for the kings [strongs id="h4428" /] of Syria [strongs id="h0758" /], by their means [strongs id="h3027" /].

And Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /] determined [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] to build [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8800" /] an house [strongs id="h1004" /] for the name [strongs id="h8034" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], and an house [strongs id="h1004" /] for his kingdom [strongs id="h4438" /].

And Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /] told out [strongs id="h5608" tvm="8799" /] threescore and ten [strongs id="h7657" /] thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] men [strongs id="h0376" /] to bear burdens [strongs id="h5449" /], and fourscore [strongs id="h8084" /] thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] [strongs id="h0376" /] to hew [strongs id="h2672" tvm="8802" /] in the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /], and three [strongs id="h7969" /] thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] and six [strongs id="h8337" /] hundred [strongs id="h3967" /] to oversee [strongs id="h5329" tvm="8764" /] them.

And Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /] sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8799" /] to Huram [strongs id="h2361" /] the king [strongs id="h4428" /] of Tyre [strongs id="h6865" /], saying [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8800" /], As thou didst deal [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] with David [strongs id="h1732" /] my father [strongs id="h0001" /], and didst send [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8799" /] him cedars [strongs id="h0730" /] to build [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8800" /] him an house [strongs id="h1004" /] to dwell [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8800" /] therein, [even so deal with me].

Behold, I build [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8802" /] an house [strongs id="h1004" /] to the name [strongs id="h8034" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] my God [strongs id="h0430" /], to dedicate [strongs id="h6942" tvm="8687" /] [it] to him, [and] to burn [strongs id="h6999" tvm="8687" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] him sweet [strongs id="h5561" /] incense [strongs id="h7004" /], and for the continual [strongs id="h8548" /] shewbread [strongs id="h4635" /], and for the burnt offerings [strongs id="h5930" /] morning [strongs id="h1242" /] and evening [strongs id="h6153" /], on the sabbaths [strongs id="h7676" /], and on the new moons [strongs id="h2320" /], and on the solemn feasts [strongs id="h4150" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] our God [strongs id="h0430" /]. This [is an ordinance] for ever [strongs id="h5769" /] to Israel [strongs id="h3478" /].

And the house [strongs id="h1004" /] which I build [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8802" /] [is] great [strongs id="h1419" /]: for great [strongs id="h1419" /] [is] our God [strongs id="h0430" /] above all gods [strongs id="h0430" /].

But who is able [strongs id="h6113" tvm="8799" /] [strongs id="h3581" /] to build [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8800" /] him an house [strongs id="h1004" /], seeing the heaven [strongs id="h8064" /] and heaven [strongs id="h8064" /] of heavens [strongs id="h8064" /] cannot contain [strongs id="h3557" tvm="8770" /] him? who [am] I then, that I should build [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8799" /] him an house [strongs id="h1004" /], save only [strongs id="h0518" /] to burn sacrifice [strongs id="h6999" tvm="8687" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] him?

Send [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8798" /] me now therefore a man [strongs id="h0376" /] cunning [strongs id="h2450" /] to work [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8800" /] in gold [strongs id="h2091" /], and in silver [strongs id="h3701" /], and in brass [strongs id="h5178" /], and in iron [strongs id="h1270" /], and in purple [strongs id="h0710" /], and crimson [strongs id="h3758" /], and blue [strongs id="h8504" /], and that can skill [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8802" /] to grave [strongs id="h6605" tvm="8763" /] [strongs id="h6603" /] with the cunning men [strongs id="h2450" /] that [are] with me in Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] and in Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /], whom David [strongs id="h1732" /] my father [strongs id="h0001" /] did provide [strongs id="h3559" tvm="8689" /].

Send [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8798" /] me also cedar [strongs id="h0730" /] trees [strongs id="h6086" /], fir trees [strongs id="h1265" /], and algum trees [strongs id="h0418" /], out of Lebanon [strongs id="h3844" /]: for I know [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8804" /] that thy servants [strongs id="h5650" /] can skill [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8802" /] to cut [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8800" /] timber [strongs id="h6086" /] in Lebanon [strongs id="h3844" /]; and, behold, my servants [strongs id="h5650" /] [shall be] with thy servants [strongs id="h5650" /],

Even to prepare [strongs id="h3559" tvm="8687" /] me timber [strongs id="h6086" /] in abundance [strongs id="h7230" /]: for the house [strongs id="h1004" /] which I am about to build [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8802" /] [shall be] wonderful [strongs id="h6381" tvm="8687" /] great [strongs id="h1419" /].

And, behold, I will give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] to thy servants [strongs id="h5650" /], the hewers [strongs id="h2404" tvm="8802" /] that cut [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8802" /] timber [strongs id="h6086" /], twenty [strongs id="h6242" /] thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] measures [strongs id="h3734" /] of beaten [strongs id="h4347" /] wheat [strongs id="h2406" /], and twenty [strongs id="h6242" /] thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] measures [strongs id="h3734" /] of barley [strongs id="h8184" /], and twenty [strongs id="h6242" /] thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] baths [strongs id="h1324" /] of wine [strongs id="h3196" /], and twenty [strongs id="h6242" /] thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] baths [strongs id="h1324" /] of oil [strongs id="h8081" /].

Then Huram [strongs id="h2361" /] the king [strongs id="h4428" /] of Tyre [strongs id="h6865" /] answered [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] in writing [strongs id="h3791" /], which he sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8799" /] to Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /], Because the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] hath loved [strongs id="h0160" /] his people [strongs id="h5971" /], he hath made [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] thee king [strongs id="h4428" /] over them.

Huram [strongs id="h2361" /] said [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8799" /] moreover, Blessed [strongs id="h1288" tvm="8803" /] [be] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] God [strongs id="h0430" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], that made [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] heaven [strongs id="h8064" /] and earth [strongs id="h0776" /], who hath given [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] to David [strongs id="h1732" /] the king [strongs id="h4428" /] a wise [strongs id="h2450" /] son [strongs id="h1121" /], endued [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8802" /] with prudence [strongs id="h7922" /] and understanding [strongs id="h0998" /], that might build [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8799" /] an house [strongs id="h1004" /] for the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], and an house [strongs id="h1004" /] for his kingdom [strongs id="h4438" /].

And now I have sent [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8804" /] a cunning [strongs id="h2450" /] man [strongs id="h0376" /], endued [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8802" /] with understanding [strongs id="h0998" /], of Huram [strongs id="h2361" /] my father’s [strongs id="h0001" /],

The son [strongs id="h1121" /] of a woman [strongs id="h0802" /] of the daughters [strongs id="h1323" /] of Dan [strongs id="h1835" /], and his father [strongs id="h0001" /] [was] a man [strongs id="h0376" /] of Tyre [strongs id="h6876" /], skilful [strongs id="h3045" tvm="8802" /] to work [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8800" /] in gold [strongs id="h2091" /], and in silver [strongs id="h3701" /], in brass [strongs id="h5178" /], in iron [strongs id="h1270" /], in stone [strongs id="h0068" /], and in timber [strongs id="h6086" /], in purple [strongs id="h0713" /], in blue [strongs id="h8504" /], and in fine linen [strongs id="h0948" /], and in crimson [strongs id="h3758" /]; also to grave [strongs id="h6605" tvm="8763" /] any manner of graving [strongs id="h6603" /], and to find out [strongs id="h2803" tvm="8800" /] every device [strongs id="h4284" /] which shall be put [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8735" /] to him, with thy cunning men [strongs id="h2450" /], and with the cunning men [strongs id="h2450" /] of my lord [strongs id="h0113" /] David [strongs id="h1732" /] thy father [strongs id="h0001" /].

Now therefore the wheat [strongs id="h2406" /], and the barley [strongs id="h8184" /], the oil [strongs id="h8081" /], and the wine [strongs id="h3196" /], which my lord [strongs id="h0113" /] hath spoken [strongs id="h0559" tvm="8804" /] of, let him send [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8799" /] unto his servants [strongs id="h5650" /]:

And we will cut [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8799" /] wood [strongs id="h6086" /] out of Lebanon [strongs id="h3844" /], as much as thou shalt need [strongs id="h6878" /]: and we will bring [strongs id="h0935" tvm="8686" /] it to thee in floats [strongs id="h7513" /] by sea [strongs id="h3220" /] to Joppa [strongs id="h3305" /]; and thou shalt carry it up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8686" /] to Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /].

And Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /] numbered [strongs id="h5608" tvm="8799" /] all the strangers [strongs id="h0582" /] [strongs id="h1616" /] that [were] in the land [strongs id="h0776" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], after [strongs id="h0310" /] the numbering [strongs id="h5610" /] wherewith David [strongs id="h1732" /] his father [strongs id="h0001" /] had numbered [strongs id="h5608" tvm="8804" /] them; and they were found [strongs id="h4672" tvm="8735" /] an hundred [strongs id="h3967" /] and fifty [strongs id="h2572" /] thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] and three [strongs id="h7969" /] thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] and six [strongs id="h8337" /] hundred [strongs id="h3967" /].

And he set [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8799" /] threescore and ten [strongs id="h7657" /] thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] of them [to be] bearers of burdens [strongs id="h5449" /], and fourscore [strongs id="h8084" /] thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] [to be] hewers [strongs id="h2672" tvm="8802" /] in the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /], and three [strongs id="h7969" /] thousand [strongs id="h0505" /] and six [strongs id="h8337" /] hundred [strongs id="h3967" /] overseers [strongs id="h5329" tvm="8764" /] to set [strongs id="h5647" /] the people [strongs id="h5971" /] a work [strongs id="h5647" tvm="8687" /].

Then Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /] began [strongs id="h2490" tvm="8686" /] to build [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8800" /] the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] at Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /] in mount [strongs id="h2022" /] Moriah [strongs id="h4179" /], where [the LORD] appeared [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8738" /] unto David [strongs id="h1732" /] his father [strongs id="h0001" /], in the place [strongs id="h4725" /] that David [strongs id="h1732" /] had prepared [strongs id="h3559" tvm="8689" /] in the threshingfloor [strongs id="h1637" /] of Ornan [strongs id="h0771" /] the Jebusite [strongs id="h2983" /].

And he began [strongs id="h2490" tvm="8686" /] to build [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8800" /] in the second [strongs id="h8145" /] [day] of the second [strongs id="h8145" /] month [strongs id="h2320" /], in the fourth [strongs id="h0702" /] year [strongs id="h8141" /] of his reign [strongs id="h4438" /].

Now these [are the things wherein] Solomon [strongs id="h8010" /] was instructed [strongs id="h3245" tvm="8717" /] for the building [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8800" /] of the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of God [strongs id="h0430" /]. The length [strongs id="h0753" /] by cubits [strongs id="h0520" /] after the first [strongs id="h7223" /] measure [strongs id="h4060" /] [was] threescore [strongs id="h8346" /] cubits [strongs id="h0520" /], and the breadth [strongs id="h7341" /] twenty [strongs id="h6242" /] cubits [strongs id="h0520" /].
